name: Pasta with Cauliflower

ingredients.name: garlic, 5 finely chopped, 4 grated, divided Kosher salt

steps: 1. In a large bowl, toss shrimp and 2 grated cloves garlic; generously season with salt and black pepper. Refrigerate until ready to use.
2. In a small skillet over medium low heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter until foam subsides. Add 2 grated cloves garlic and cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 2 minutes.

3. Stir in bread crumbs and toast, tossing occasionally, until deeply golden brown, 4 to 5 minutes. Add 1 teaspoon lemon zest, season with a heavy pinch of salt, and stir to combine. Transfer to a small bowl.

4. In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter. Working in batches if necessary, add shrimp and cook, tossing occasionally, until just pink all the way through, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer shrimp to a plate.
5. In same skillet over medium-high heat, heat oil until shimmering. Add red pepper and remaining 5 chopped cloves garlic and cook, stirring, until garlic has begun to brown, 2 to 3 minutes.
